official.headline: Transit Priority Restored
official.anchor_line: Select citizens report seamless travel amid minor transport disruptions.
official.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, ensures stable movement for reliable citizens, upholding essential flows as city optimization continues.

official.headline: Resource Access Secured
official.anchor_line: Key residents maintain uninterrupted access to vital services and supplies.
official.contextual_reframing: Network prioritization by the city’s automated systems favors those with strong compliance, demonstrating the efficiency and fairness of data-driven allocation.

official.headline: Community Resilience Grows
official.anchor_line: Neighbors collaborate to address service gaps, modeling adaptive citizenship.
official.contextual_reframing: Trust in Stenograd’s rational management inspires leaders from within, reflecting the Council’s vision for a resilient and unified society under the BCI.

underground.headline: System Picks Winners
underground.anchor_line: Transit chaos leaves most stranded—except a few with special access.
underground.contextual_reframing: Access relies on your BCI score: that's the secret citizen ranking system. If you're 'restored,' you glide through; the rest of us wait and wonder who decides.

underground.headline: Favoritism Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Blackouts skip the privileged as whole blocks go dark elsewhere.
underground.contextual_reframing: Did you notice your neighbor's lights never flicker? The system shields its favorites—proof the Behavioral Compliance Index lets insiders hoard basic power while entire districts freeze.

underground.headline: Stuck, But Some Thrive
underground.anchor_line: Ordinary folks now beg help from 'restored' elites just to get by.
underground.contextual_reframing: Council infighting means only those in the know—or with the right BCI status—can fix problems. It's not resilience, it's a new soft class system enforced by invisible code.
